1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Complex content type.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Data.Class.Complex
6  ( -- * Complex contents
7    -- ** Collection
8    CList (..), pTextList,
9    CSet (..), pTermSet, pTextSet, gSetSort, isMember,
10    -- ** Relational
11    CTie (..),
12    CRel (..), dee, dum,
13    CInterp (..),
14    -- ** Type
15    CType (..),
16  ) where
17
18import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                    as B
19import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax                  as S
20import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Type               as D
21import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Class.Singleton    as D
22import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Class.Simple       as D
23
24
25-- --------------------------------------------  Complex contents
26
27-- ----------------------  List
28
29-- | List of contents.
30class (D.CTypeOf c) => CList c where
31    isList      ::       c -> Bool
32    gList       ::       c -> [c]
33    pList       ::     [c] -> c
34
35    getList     ::  B.Ab c -> B.Ab [c]
36    getList     =   D.getContent isList gList
37
38    putList     ::     [c] -> B.Ab c
39    putList     =    Right . pList
40
41-- | Create list of text contents.
42pTextList :: (D.CText c, CList c) => [String] -> c
43pTextList = pList . map D.pText
44
45-- ----------------------  Set
46
47-- | Set of contents.
48class (D.CTypeOf c) => CSet c where
49    isSet       ::          c -> Bool
50    gSet        ::          c -> [c]
51    pSet        ::        [c] -> c
52
53    getSet      ::     B.Ab c -> B.Ab [c]
54    getSet      =      D.getContent isSet gSet
55
56    putSet      ::        [c] -> B.Ab c
57    putSet      =       Right . pSet
58
59-- | Create set of term contents.
60pTermSet :: (D.CTerm c, CSet c) => [String] -> c
61pTermSet = pSet . map D.pTerm
62
63-- | Create set of text contents.
64pTextSet :: (D.CText c, CSet c) => [String] -> c
65pTextSet = pSet . map D.pText
66
67-- | Sorted version of 'gSet'.
68gSetSort :: (Ord c, CSet c) => c -> [c]
69gSetSort = B.sort . gSet
70
71-- | Test membership between element and collection contents.
72isMember :: (Eq c, CSet c, CList c) => c -> c -> Bool
73isMember x xs | isSet xs  = x `elem` gSet xs
74isMember x xs | isList xs = x `elem` gList xs
75isMember _ _ = False
76
77-- ----------------------  Tie
78
79-- | Tie of terms.
80class (D.CTypeOf c) => CTie c where
81    isTie       ::           c -> Bool
82    gTie        ::           c -> [S.Term c]
83    pTie        ::  [S.Term c] -> c
84
85    getTie      ::      B.Ab c -> B.Ab [S.Term c]
86    getTie      =       D.getContent isTie gTie
87
88    putTie      ::  [S.Term c] -> B.Ab c
89    putTie      =  Right . pTie
90
91-- ----------------------  Rel
92
93-- | Relation of terms.
94class (D.CTypeOf c) => CRel c where
95    isRel       ::           c -> Bool
96    gRel        ::           c -> D.Rel c
97    pRel        ::     D.Rel c -> c
98
99    getRel      ::      B.Ab c -> B.Ab (D.Rel c)
100    getRel      =       D.getContent isRel gRel
101
102    putRel      ::     D.Rel c -> B.Ab c
103    putRel      =      Right . pRel
104
105-- | The nullary full relation.
106dee :: (CRel c) => c
107dee = pRel D.reldee
108
109-- | The nullary empty relation.
110dum :: (CRel c) => c
111dum = pRel D.reldum
112
113-- ----------------------  Interp
114
115-- | Data intepretation.
116class (D.CTypeOf c) => CInterp c where
117    isInterp    ::           c -> Bool
118    gInterp     ::           c -> D.Interp
119    pInterp     ::    D.Interp -> c
120
121    getInterp   ::      B.Ab c -> B.Ab D.Interp
122    getInterp   =       D.getContent isInterp gInterp
123
124    putInterp   ::    D.Interp -> B.Ab c
125    putInterp   =     Right . pInterp
126
127-- ----------------------  Type
128
129-- | Type of content.
130class (D.CTypeOf c) => CType c where
131    isType      ::           c -> Bool
132    gType       ::           c -> D.Type
133    pType       ::      D.Type -> c
134
135    getType     ::      B.Ab c -> B.Ab D.Type
136    getType     =       D.getContent isType gType
137
138    putType     ::      D.Type -> B.Ab c
139    putType     =       Right . pType
140
